metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21853 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Multiple exploitable integer overflow vulnerabilities exist within theMPEG-4 decoding functionality of the GPAC Project on Advanced Contentlibrary v1.0.1. A specially crafted MPEG-4 input can cause an integeroverflow due to unchecked addition arithmetic resulting in a heap-basedbuffer overflow that causes memory corruption. An attacker can convince auser to open a video to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
